A Spread of Rampant Green.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered Wetland, and 1 in the Jungle without any DAHAN. (If there is more than 1 such Jungle, you mar choose.)

Bringer of Dreams and Nightmares.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board, in the highest-numbered Sands.

tier_1.effect: Turn any face-down Fear Card face-up. (It's earned/resolved normally, but players can see what's coming.)

tier_2.effect: Target Spirit gains an Element they have at least 1 of.

Devouring Teeth Lurk Underfoot.setup:
Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board, in land #5.
You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 0 energy.

innate_power_1.name: death approaches from beneath the surface

tier_1.effect: If you don't have PRESENCE in target land, Gather 1 of your PRESENCE. (This is required.)

tier_2.effect: 1 Damage. (<em>+1 for your "Territorial Aggression" Special Rule)

Downpour Drenches the World.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board in the lowest-numbered Wetland.

tier_1.effect: Each of your PRESENCE grants Defend 1 and lowers DAHAN counterattack Damage by 1. (Total, in its land.)

tier_2.effect: Each of your PRESENCE grants Defend 1 and lowers DAHAN counterattack Damage by 1.

tier_3.effect: 2 FEAR. In your lands, Invaders and DAHAN have -1 Health (min. 1).

tier_1.effect: Gain 1 Energy. You may Remove 1 BLIGHT by Removing 1 of your PRESENCE ( from target land).

tier_2.effect: Gain +1 Energy. Gather up to 1 DAHAN.

tier_3.effect: When BLIGHT would be added to target land, instead leave it on the card.

Eyes Watch from the Trees.setup:
Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board, in the highest-numbered Jungle.
You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 0 energy.

Fathomless Mud of the Swamp.setup:
Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board, in the lowest-numbered Wetland.
You start with your 4 UNique Power Cards and 0 Energy.

tier_1.effect: Move 1 of your PRESENCE from the origin shrine to the target land. (This is required.)

Finder of Paths Unseen.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board in land #3. Put 1 PRESENCE on any board in land #1. Note that you have 6 Unique Power Cards.

innate_power_1.name: lay paths they cannot help but walk

tier_1.effect: Push up to half (round down) of Invaders from target land. Do likewise for DAHAN, PRESENCE, and BEASTS (each separately).

Fractured Days Split the Sky.setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the lowest-numbered land with DAHAN, and 2 in the highest-numbered land without DAHAN. Deal 4 Minor and 4 Major Powers face-up as your initial Days That Never Were cards; in a 1 or 2-player game, instead deal 6 of each. In a 1-board game, gain 1 Time.

tier_1.effect: Target spirit may Resolve 1 SLOW Power now.

tier_2.effect: Target Spirit may Reclaim 1 Power Card from their discarded or played cards. (If they Reclaim a card from play, they lose its Elements.)

tier_3.effect: Target Spirit may play a Power Card by paying its cost.

tier_1.effect: Look at the top card of either the Invader Deck of (if relevant) the Event Deck. Return it, then shuffle that desk's top 2 cards. (?For the Invader Deck, differing Invader Stages may give away which card is next.)

tier_2.effect: Instead of returning-and-shuffling, you may put the card you looked at on the bottom of its deck. You may not do this for cards specially placed during Setup.

Grinning Trickster Stirs Up Trouble.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered land with DAHAN, and 1 in ladn #4.

tier_1.effect:
Discard Minor Powers from the desk until you get one that targets a land. Use its text effects on target land immediately, ignoring normal Range and targeting restrictions. All "up to" must be used at max. value. Treat all "OR" as "AND"s.
()It is not considered a card of yours or a card in play. Its effects are treated as performed by this Power, as if its text were copied here.)

tier_2.effect: You may Forget a Power Card to gain the just-used Power Card (to hand) and 1 Energy.

innate_power_2.name: why don't you and then fight

tier_3.effect: 1 Invader and 1 DAHAN deal Damage to each other.

tier_4.effect: If target land has BEASTS, 2 Damage. Otherwise, you may Gather 1 BEASTS.

Heart of the Wildfire.setup: Put 3 PRESENCE and 2 BLIGHT on your starting board in the highest-numbered Sands. (BLIGHT comes from the box, not the Blight Card.)

tier_2.effect: Instead, 1 Damage per FIRE you have.

tier_3.effect: Split this Power's Damage however desired between target land and any number of your lands with BLIGHT.

tier_4.effect: In a land with BLIGHT where you have PRESENCE, Push all DAHAN. Destroy all Invaders and BEASTS. Add 1 BLIGHT.

tier_1.effect: If target land has 2 BLIGHT or more, remove 1 BLIGHT.

Keeper of the Forbidden Wilds.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE and 1 WILDS on your starting board in the highest-numbered Jungle.

tier_2.effect: +1 Damage per SUN PLANT you have.

tier_3.effect: You may split this Power's Damage however desired between target land and one of our lands.

tier_1.effect: Push 1 EXPLORER from target land per 2 SUN you have.

tier_2.effect: If target land has no EXPLORER, add 1 WILDS.

Lightning's Swift Strike.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board, in the highest-numbered Sands.

Lure of the Deep Wilderness.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in land #8, and 1 in land #7. Add 1 BEASTS to land #8.

innate_power_1.name: forsake society to chase after dreams

tier_2.effect: Destroy up to 2 EXPLORER per BADLANDS/BEASTS/DISEASE/WILDS.

Many Minds Move as One.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE and 1 BEASTS on your starting board, in a land with BEASTS. Note that you have 5 Unique Power Cards.

tier_2.effect: Instead, Gather up to 1 BEASTS per AIR you have.

Ocean's Hungry Grasp.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the Ocean, and 1 in a Coastal land of your choice.

Rising Heat of Stone and Sand.setup:
Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board, in the highest-numbered Sands.
You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 0 energy.

River Surges in Sunlight.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board in the highest-numbered Wetland.

tier_2.effect: Instead, 2 Damage. Push up to 3 EXPLORER/TOWN.

Serpent Slumbering Beneath the Island.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board in land #5.

tier_1.effect: Gain 1 Energy. Other Spirits with any Absorbed Presence also gain 1 Energy.

tier_2.effect: Add 1 PRESENCE at 1_RANGE. Other Spirits with 2 or more Absorbed Presence may do likewise.

tier_3.effect: Gain a Major Power without forgetting. Other Spirits with 3 or more Absorbed Presence may do likewise.

tier_1.effect: For each FIRE EARTH you have, 1 Damage to 1 TOWN/CITY.

tier_2.effect: For each 2 MOON 2 EARTH you have, 2 FEAR and you may Push 1 TOWN from that target land.

tier_3.effect: In every land in the game: X Damage, where X is the number of Presence you have in and adjacent to that land.

Shadows Flicker Like Flame.setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in the highest-numbered Jungle and 1 in land #5.

tier_2.effect: Destroy up to 2 EXPLORER. 1 FEAR per EXPLORER destroyed.

tier_3.effect: 3 Damage. 1 FEAR per Invader destroyed by this Damage.

Sharp Fangs Behind the Leaves.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE and 1 BEASTS on your starting board in the highest-numbered Jungle. Put 1 PRESENCE in a land of your choice with BEASTS anywhere on the island.

tier_3.effect: You may Push up to 2 BEASTS.

Shifting Memory of Ages.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board in the highest-numbered land that is Sands or Mountain. Get out the Element Markers. Prepare 1 MOON, 1 AIR, and 1 EARTH marker (put them by your Special Rules).

tier_3.effect: Instead, Defend 2 per card in the Invader discard pile.

tier_2.effect: Instead, after each of the next three Actions that change which pieces are in a target land, Prepare 1 Element Marker.

Shroud of Silent Mist.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered Wetland, 1 and 1 in the highest-numbered Mountain.

tier_2.effect: For each adjacent land with your PRESENCE, 1 Damage to a different Invader.

Starlight Seeks Its Form.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board, in a land with BLIGHT. Note that you have 6 Presence Trackers - cover all dashed circles with PRESENCE> The solid spaces at the left side of the bottom 2 Presence Tracks remain clear.

tier_1.effect: Push up to 2 EXPLORER or 1 TOWN.

innate_power_3.name: wood seeks growth, humans seek freedom

tier_1.effect: Choose a Spirit with PRESENCE in target land. They gain a Power Card.

tier_2.effect: 1 Damage per DAHAN OR Push up to 3 DAHAN.

innate_power_5.name: stars blaze in the daytime sky

tier_1.effect: 3 FEAR. Gain 1 Energy. Reclaim up to 1 Power Card from play or your discard pile.

Stone's Unyielding Defiance.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the lowest-numbered Mountain without DAHAN; 1 in an adjacent land that has BLIGHT (if possible) or is Sands (if not).

innate_power_1.name: hold the island fast with a bulwark of will

tier_1.effect: When BLIGHT is added to one of your lands, you may pay 2 Energy per BLIGHT to take it from the box instead of from the Blight Card. (Handle any cascade separately.)

tier_2.effect: The cost is 1 Energy instead of 2.

tier_3.effect: When an Event or Blight Card directly Destroy PRESENCE (yours or others'), you may prevent any number of PRESENCE from being Destroyed by paying 1 Energy each. ("Directly" means "not by adding BLIGHT".)

innate_power_2.name: let them break themselves against the stone

tier_1.effect: After Invaders deal1 or more Damage to target land, 2 Damage.

tier_2.effect: Also deal half the Damage Invader did to the land (rounding down).

Sun-Bright Whirlwind.setup:
Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered Sands, and 2 in the lowest-numbered Mountain.
You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 0 energy.

tier_3.effect: For each Invader Pushed by this Power, 1 Damage in the land it was Pushed to.

Thunderspeaker.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in each of the 2 lands with the most DAHAN.

tier_2.effect: Gather up to 1 DAHAN per AIR you have. Push up to 1 DAHAN per SUN you have.
Destroy 1 TOWN for every 2 DAHAN in target land.

tier_3.effect: Destroy 1 CITY for every 3 DAHAN in target land.

Vengeance as a Burning Plague.setup: 1 if your PRESENCE starts the game already Destroyed. Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in a land with BLIGHT, 1 in a Wetland without DAHAN.

tier_3.effect: +1 Damage per DISEASE. 1 FEAR per DISEASE (max. 5). Remove 1 DISEASE.

Vital Strength of the Earth.setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in the highest-numbered Mountain,1 in the highest-numbered Jungle.

tier_1.effect: Once this turn, Target Spirit may Repeat 1 Power Card with Energy cost of 1 or less.

tier_2.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 3 or less.

tier_3.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 6 or less.

Volcano Looming High.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE and 1 BADLANDS on your starting board in a Mountain of your choice. Push all DAHAN from that land.

tier_1.effect: In one land within 1_RANGE, X Damage.

tier_3.effect: In each land within 1_RANGE, 4 Damage. Add 1 BLIGHT to target land; doing so does not Destroy your PRESNECE.

tier_4.effect: In each land within 2_RANGE, +4 Damage. In each land adjacent to the target, add 1 BLIGHT if it doesn't have any.

innate_power_2.name: powered by the furnace of the earth

tier_3.effect: Move up to 2 of your PRESENCE from other lands to target land.

tier_4.effect: Return up to 2 of your Destroyed PRESENCE to your PRESENCE tracks.
